segments.text: That I can't go on any longer without you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know you shouldn't say that at a time like this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nancy , I made up my mind you were the only woman for me at the first sight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Too sudden ! I'm not ready for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Forgive me for startling you with the impetuosity of my sentiments .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Stop it . No more of that talk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I hope so . This is what you were meant for . Say you love me , say yes , say yes .
segments.speaker: S1
